Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

ClearCurrentPeriod.description: This action sets the CurrentPeriod property's values to 0.
ClearCurrentPeriod.longDescription: This action shall set the CurrentPeriod property's values to 0.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CurrentPeriod.description: The memory metrics since the last switch reset or ClearCurrentPeriod action for a switch.
CurrentPeriod.longDescription: This type shall describe the memory metrics since last reset or ClearCurrentPeriod action for a switch.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CorrectableECCErrorCount.description: The number of the correctable errors of memory since reset.
CorrectableECCErrorCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of correctable errors of memory since reset.

UncorrectableECCErrorCount.description: The number of the uncorrectable errors of memory since reset.
UncorrectableECCErrorCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of uncorrectable errors of memory since reset.

InternalMemoryMetrics.description: The memory metrics for a switch.
InternalMemoryMetrics.longDescription: This property shall contain properties that describe the memory metrics for a switch.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CurrentPeriod.description: The memory metrics since the last reset for this switch.
CurrentPeriod.longDescription: This property shall contain properties that describe the metrics for the current period of memory for this switch.

LifeTime.description: The memory metrics for the lifetime of this switch.
LifeTime.longDescription: This property shall contain properties that describe the metrics for the lifetime of memory for this switch.

LifeTime.description: The memory metrics for the lifetime for a switch.
LifeTime.longDescription: This type shall describe the memory metrics since manufacturing for a switch.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CorrectableECCErrorCount.description: The number of the correctable errors for the lifetime of the memory.
CorrectableECCErrorCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of the correctable errors for the lifetime of memory.

UncorrectableECCErrorCount.description: The number of the uncorrectable errors for the lifetime of the memory.
UncorrectableECCErrorCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of the uncorrectable errors for the lifetime of memory.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SwitchMetrics.description: The SwitchMetrics schema contains usage and health statistics for a switch device.
SwitchMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represent the metrics for a switch device in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

InternalMemoryMetrics.description: The memory metrics for a switch.
InternalMemoryMetrics.longDescription: This property shall contain properties that describe the memory metrics for a switch.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeErrors.description: The PCIe errors associated with this switch.
PCIeErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCIe errors associated with this switch.
